contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.description: Gadget for your Google homepage or website that displays multiple analog or digital clocks at the times in the selected time zones or countries/cities. The clocks can be synchronized with our server to always display the correct times. This gadget is especially useful when working with Globally Dispersed Teams or when interacting with worldwide friends.

Gadget Mode - Allowed values: ana1 (Analog Clocks (1 per row)) ana2 (Analog Clocks (2 per row)) ana3 (Analog Clocks (3 per row)) ana4 (Analog Clocks (4 per row)) digt (Digital Clocks (Time only)) digd (Digital Clocks (Time and Date))
Digital time - Allowed values: 0 (None) 12 (12h format (AM/PM)) 24 (24h format)
Digital time text size - Allowed values: 10 (Very small) 12 (Small) 14 (Medium) 16 (Large)
Analog time - Allowed values: 12 (12h clock) 24 (24h clock)
Date format - Allowed values: date (__MSG_Mon__ 21 __MSG_Aug__) day (__MSG_Monday__) d (__MSG_Mon__) mdy (8/21/2006) dmy (21/8/2006) ymd (2006/8/21)

Clock #1 Location - Allowed values: UTC (UTC) AF (Afghanistan) AL (Albania) DZ (Algeria) AS (American Samoa) AD (Andorra) AO (Angola) AI (Anguilla) AG (Antigua and Barbuda) AR-BA (Argentina - Buenos Aires) AR-CT (Argentina - Catamarca) AR-CC (Argentina - Chaco) AR-CH (Argentina - Chubut) AR-DF (Argentina - Ciudad de Buenos Aires) AR-CB (Argentina - Córdoba) AR-CN (Argentina - Corrientes) AR-ER (Ar...
